content.body: I hope someone makes sure they're not going to introduce that for identifiers or something dumb like that

zewt: Found out big chinese sites like 163.com opens EVERY link in _blank. Fscking infuriating.
smaug____, should exceptions thrown from event handlers be propagated to the dispatchEvent() caller?
there can be several exceptions, so it would be unclear which exception to throw to dispatchEvent caller
Ms2ger: do exceptions propagate in some implementations ?
No, but the specs aren't clear
